entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 15 April 2023
